post:
Hello,

You can use 200GBEXTRA coupon for 200GB extra HDD space. It is valid for KVM HDD Limited, KVM HDD, KVM HDD Plus and KVM HDD Plus II packages. The coupon expires on May 25th. The VPS specs are listed below:

**KVM HDD Plus**

<pre>
2 vCPU core AMD Opteron 6128
Unlimited CPU cores 2GHz
8GB ECC RAM
200GB HDD RAID-1
Linux/Windows OS
Unmetered 250Mbps bandwidth
1 IPv4
DDoS protection
Control Panel - OpenNebula
Location - France (OVH)
Price - $6.99/mo
Link - https://www.wishosting.com/order/config/index/VPS/?group_id=2&pricing_id=35
</pre>

**KVM NAT Storage US**

<pre>
1 vCPU core Xeon L5520
Unlimited CPU core 2.27GHz
2GB RAM
500GB HDD RAID-5
Linux/Windows OS
Bandwidth 250Mbit
Traffic 2TB
1 IPv4 NAT
DDoS protection
Location - Las Vegas
Price - $4.99/mo (or $11.99/quarter)
Link - https://www.wishosting.com/order/config/index/VPS/?group_id=2&pricing_id=50
</pre>

**KVM NAT Storage**

<pre>
1 vCPU core i7-3770
Unlimited CPU core 3.7GHz Turbo
1GB RAM
1TB HDD RAID-5
Linux/Windows OS
Bandwidth 250Mbps
Traffic 2TB/mo
1 IPv4 NAT
DDoS protection
Location - Germany (Hetzner)
Price - $5.99/mo
Link - https://www.wishosting.com/order/config/index/VPS/?group_id=2&pricing_id=42
</pre>

**KVM SSD Limited**

<pre>
1 vCPU core Xeon L5520
Unlimited CPU core 2.27GHz
2GB RAM
12GB SSD
Linux/Windows OS
Bandwidth 250Mbit
Traffic 1TB
1 IPv4 address
Control Panel - OpenNebula
Location - Los Angeles (Colo@)
Price - $3.99/mo
Link - https://www.wishosting.com/order/config/index/VPS/?group_id=2&pricing_id=40
</pre>

**KVM HDD Limited**

<pre>
1 vCPU core Xeon E5-1620 v2
Unlimited CPU core 3.7GHz
2GB ECC RAM
200GB HDD RAID-5
Linux/Windows OS
Unmetered 250Mbps bandwidth
1 IPv4
DDoS protection
Control Panel - OpenNebula
Location - France (OVH)
Price - $3.99/mo
Link - https://www.wishosting.com/order/config/index/VPS/?group_id=2&pricing_id=29

**KVM HDD**

<pre>
1 vCPU core Xeon E5606
Unlimited CPU core 2.13GHz
6GB ECC RAM
120GB HDD RAID-1
Linux/Windows OS
Unmetered 250Mbps bandwidth
1 IPv4
DDoS protection
Control Panel - OpenNebula
Location - France (OVH)
Price - $5.99/mo
Link - https://www.wishosting.com/order/config/index/VPS/?group_id=2&pricing_id=26
</pre>

You can order several packages of the same type and combine them into one VM. Also you can request a private networking between your VMs.

The payment gateway is Bitpay (Bitcoin) or 2Checkout (PayPal), it is also possible to pay via Skrill manually, just open a ticket.

For anyone interested there is also an affiliate program - https://www.wishosting.com/plugin/support_manager/knowledgebase/view/18/affiliate-program/1/

https://www.wishosting.com
